nodes.title: 2. Location
nodes.body: Above the village of Tsha lung, five hours from Dunai on the northern side of the Bheri river, opposite Juphal, up a steep trail.

nodes.title: Founder of the dgon pa
nodes.body: Bla ma Tre ston Srid rgyal bzang po, a disciple of Tre ston Tshe dbang tshul khrims.

nodes.title: Present bla ma
nodes.body: Shes rab phun tshogs, a sngags pa who is a rare visitor to Kathmandu. No old texts are kept here.

nodes.title: 4-7. Hierarchical System, Number of monks, education system, exchange
nodes.body: Lineage householder bla mas, from father to son.

nodes.title: 8-13. Villages
nodes.body: The villages are Tsha lung and Kalikara.
